title: Trying to connect to game for 25 minutes
body:
R%%%%% Pantheon raging at me about being AFK, despite the fact that I explained to him that I was trying to connect the entire time I was disconnected.

I explain to him what "AFK" means (Away From Keyboard), and explain to him that I was AT my keyboard for the entire time, trying to reconnect, and the dumbass says, 
"I DONT CAR
U WASNT PLAYING
SO AFK"

-facedesk-

The League community is full of r%%%%%s.
